example.parse: (PRT (CONNEC_PART ف)) (VP (PSEUDO_VERB ان) (NP-SBJ-1 (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC استخدام) (NP (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN البنزين)) (ADJP (DET+ADJ الخالي) (PP (PREP من) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الرصاص)))))) (UCP (S (VP (IV3MS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I يطيل) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *-1)) (NP-OBJ (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC عمر) (NP (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_PL+CASE_DEF_GEN شمعات) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الاحتراق)))
